title: Hope Announces Made in UK 35R Riser Bar
content:
Shorter head tubes mean a shorter stack, and a number of riders have found that higher handlebars are a good way to compensate. Hope just announced its made in the UK 35R riser bar ($235.46). These handlebars have a rise of 35 mm and are 100% designed, tested, and manufactured in Barnoldswick, UK, from fully recyclable carbon fiber. Expect the 35R to arrive in April.

Specs:

  • 800mm wide with cut marks for custom length adjustments
  • 35⌀ clamp
  • 35mm Rise
  • 5° Upsweep,
  • 8° Backsweep
  • Lightweight construction: 245g (Ø35mm)
  • Revolutionary, fully recyclable manufacturing technique
  • Optimized laminate design with varying wall sections for enhanced material efficiency
  • Precision alignment grids on both sides for easy control setup

See more on the 35R at Hope Tech.
